attributes.action: Build a statue in honor of Princess Diana
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I went to London today, over whelmed with british pride. I visted everything i could, Buckingham palace, big ben, westminster abbey, the ritz, london eye, kensington palace and the 'princess diana memorial fountain'. Which i was very disappointed in. 
Lady Princess Diana captured the hearts of millions across the world.
She was the peoples princess and the world loves her to this day, billions of people cried and prayed when she passed away that tragic night in paris.
In honor of Princess Diana, i propose there should be a statue of her that we can all visit to look up to and remember her. to pay our respects and lay flowers. A statue that all the other kings, queens and royal people have, why not her? if anyone in the world desearves this, its princess diana. xxx
